input.name: query
input.value: - enter a claim that you think is disputed -

div.div:
Tell Dispute Finder about a claim on the web that you believe is disputed.
To avoid creating duplicates, first search our database to check it isn't already there.
Try to use a minimal expression of the claim. For example:
I dispute the claim that global warming is a hoax
I dispute the claim that gun control would reduce crime
I dispute the claim that eskimos have many words for snow
I dispute the claim that margarine is healthier than butter
I dispute the claim that the world is running out of oil
Just because a claim is disputed does not mean that it is wrong. It just means that there are other points of view that people might want to know about.
Dispute Finder relies on users like you to tell it claims that are made on the web that they think are disputed.
